title: Quinn Range Being posted
body: I'm sure you at riot know this already, but quinn seems to have a bug with her E at the moment, where when she uses her E it will post in all chat the range at which she used it from. It's kinda annoying, nothing major or game changing, just annoying.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! Looking into this now.

Also noticed a mysterious similarity to this bug. However, I can't seem to replicate it, and it's only happened three times so far. Twice in a single game, and one time in a second game which I have posted in this thread: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=48977362#post48977362

I saw this second bug in a game just now a well.  I didn't see what actually caused it, but the number "3" was printed to the chat log on its own.  I only noticed it once in the game.

We did have an Irelia on our team, though I wasn't playing her.  I think she was attacking the enemy inhibitor when it happened, but I was not nearby and she was not on my screen.

Full champion roster for the game was (Katarina, Irelia, Hecarim, Thresh, Twitch) vs (Tristana, Vladimir, Elise, Teemo, Sona.)
Bug is also occuring with Fiora.  Might be an issue with how their dashes are being handled.
Can you show us Sion's reworked kit right now?
I also have had this issue in a game I just played with Maokai. It seemed to happen when I used Sapling Toss, the chat would say something liike "DistanceB 123.45678" or something similar.

noticed it yesterday 

bbut nobody cares abut buggs on this forum 
i already made a thread about master yi automaticaly spamming his taunts all game, and it got buried in an hour
